Transliterated Text: djed medu neferu in nTr aA
English Translation: Beautiful words spoken by the great god
True of voice
He did good things for his lord
He listened to him as he spoke
His body trembled with his brother
Life, prosperity, and health
Life, prosperity, and health to his lord
Before you is all good
I am the excellent one among the common people

Transliterated Text: pA sS iry m pr anx
English Translation: The scribe is the one who acts in the house of life
May years come to you in peace
It is created for the beautiful Aten
The god made the land
His heart rejoices for Aten
The living, good, sacred god
May the heart of the land live
Good is the heart of the beloved one
Your beloved does as you desire
May you live, and your beloved be before you
Shine for the living lord
Do good for the noble lady
Devise plans concerning the common people

Transliterated Text: anx wDA snb m Dd mdw
English Translation: Life, prosperity, and health in spoken words
His arm was extended, true of voice
I am foremost among the sons of Ra
He who rises upon the land
Words spoken by Lady Hathor
My heart is set on hearing you

Transliterated Text: Htp di nsw in Imn-Ra nb nswt tAwy
English Translation: An offering given by the king to Amun-Ra, lord of the thrones of the Two Lands
Cleaned Transliteration: htp di nsw imnra nb nswt tawy
Cleaned English: offering given king amunra lord throne two land

English Translation: His body prepared for the sacred land
